column3: skit slim shady eminem  eminem no eminem no hahaha wake the fuck up motherfucker what do you want from me hahahaha remember me i killed you you thought i was dead didn't you what do you want from me i'm alive oh god get up no get up and look in the mirror i don't want to look in the mirror it's just a reflection haha leave me alone look in the mirror you're nothing you're nothing without me look in the motherfucking mirror leave me alone leave me the fuck alone eminem punches the mirror breaking it  low down dirty being scratched
